Plot Fire Weather Index trends

plot_fwi_trend.Rd

Creates a time series plot of yearly Fire Weather Index values for southeastern Australia, based on the bushfire dataset.

Usage

plot_fwi_trend(data = bushfire, metric = "mean")

Arguments

data

A tibble like bushfire containing columns year, fwi_mean, and fwi_max.

metric

Character string, either "mean" or "max", selecting which FWI measure to plot.

Value

A ggplot object showing the trend over time.

Examples

data(bushfire)
plot_fwi_trend(bushfire, metric = "mean")
#> `geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'

plot_fwi_trend(bushfire, metric = "max")
#> `geom_smooth()` using formula = 'y ~ x'
